oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alvin C. York story -- Three Forks of the Wolf

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Historic sites; Clothing & dress; Valleys; Automobiles
Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four unidentified men standing on a gravel road. Two are looking out at the Wolf Forks area; a third has a camera on a tripod, and the fourth is facing the camera. There is a "road closed" sign on the left and the front end of an automobile on the right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert Franklin Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph is part of the research conducted for Warner Brothers Studio in preparation for the filming of the motion picture, "Sergeant York."
